song.title: Amiga Sex Garden
song.info:
Very Utah Saints, yeah? This was my take on their "Something Good", using Opus III's "It's A Fine Day" instead of Kate Bush, along with THOSE piano samples YET AGAIN. Early 90's rave music, and still one I like. The name is a mickey take of the band Miranda Sex Garden.
<SMPL000> : (Loop: See Loop mix) <SMPL001> : --------------------- <SMPL002> : Written by Subculture <SMPL003> : Vocals by Opus III <SMPL004> : 1-4-93 ------- PT1.1B <SMPL005> : --------------------- <SMPL006> : I was determined to <SMPL007> : use these "It's A <SMPL008> : Fine Day" samples in <SMPL009> : something! Thing is, <SMPL010> : they're really diffi- <SMPL011> : cult to use because <SMPL012> : the "leee" bit is <SMPL013> : about half a semitone <SMPL014> : higher than the rest! <SMPL015> : I can cope though... <SMPL016> : --------------------- <SMPL017> : Sam Brown, 4 Carbery <SMPL018> : Close, Oadby Grange, <SMPL019> : Leicester, LE2 4TA, <SMPL020> : England! or EMail on: <SMPL021> : U1B43@UK.AC.KEELE. <SMPL022> : ---------------- SEQ1 <SMPL023> : .:@ @:. <SMPL024> : @@@@ @@@@ <SMPL025> : .@@@ @@@@ @@@. <SMPL026> : @@@@@@ @@@@@@@@ <SMPL027> : @@ <SMPL028> : @@ @@ <SMPL029> : @@@@ <SMPL030> : ------- @@@@ - Subby!
